Buff2_Description: Attack Speed increased for being a Werewolf.
Buff3_Description: Damage increased for being a Werebear.
desc:
After being a Werewolf for {c_number}{buffduration:TIMER_WOLF}{/c} seconds, gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_ATTACK_SPEED}{/c} seconds. 

After being a Werebear for {c_number}{buffduration:TIMER_BEAR}{/c} seconds, deal {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_ATTACK_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
name: Bestial Rampage
